title: Post game screen won't load or takes forever to load....
body:
As title says... I've sat here waiting a good 5-10 mins I heard the noise of people joining and leaving but I'm still watching a swirling icon. This is fairly short considering how long I've had to wait before. Sometimes I'm waiting over half an hour so I just force close the game and reopen the game. 
Is there any work around/fix for this? It should not take this long to hit the post game screen T_T

replies.body: You might hav[e close client during game mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) enabled, which closes the client when your match starts.  This can help with some pc stress, but it may take a few moments for your client to relaunch when the match ends.  It's strange that it's taking so long though, so in this case it could be a connection problem struggling to transition you from the game server back to the client.  My suggestion would be to also go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure any blocks along the way is swept.  I hope that helps!

I've been through everything twice over now and the problem seemed to fade away but now it just comes and goes at random. Haven't had a particularly long one for a good long time until today (which made me revisit this).
